title: yamaha technical certificate font
content:
Hi There this is my first time posting can anyone please help me Id this font I saw it in a yamaha tecnical certificate  
but can't find a match any help much appreciated  
Thanks

[http://typophile.com/files/yamfont4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140411200052/http:/typophile.com/files/yamfont4.jpg "http://typophile.com/files/yamfont4.jpg")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [yamfont4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140411200052/http:/typophile.com/files/yamfont4.jpg) | 25.52 KB |
author: bremboy

comments.content:
Welcome to Typophile!  
The type looks like a customized Rotis Sans bold italic. There are a lot of changes compared to the original: a, s, t, p, d, f are significantly altered, as well as the extreme sloping.
